Name: Energy Scarf
LongDescription: Boosts maximum PP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Shinx, Luxio, and Luxray.  You can get an Energy Scarf at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Shinx Claw, a Shinx Fang, and a Flash Tag. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
